    • play.db.jpa中JPABase的使用

      play.db.jpa中JPABase的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  GenericModel
      A super class for JPA entities
      class  JPASupport
      已过时。 
      class  Model
      Base class for JPA model objects Automatically provide a @Id Long id field

      static <T extends JPABase>

      static <T extends JPABase>

      Find all entities of this type
      static <T extends JPABase> 
      T      		 GenericModel.findById(java.lang.Object id)
      Find the entity with the corresponding id.
      <T extends JPABase> 
      T      		 GenericModel.merge()
      Merge this object to obtain a managed entity (usefull when the object comes from the Cache).
      <T extends JPABase> 
      T      		 GenericModel.refresh()
      Refresh the entity state.
      <T extends JPABase> 
      T      		 GenericModel.save()
      store (ie insert) the entity.
